title: Crowding out increases i, decreases Ig

content.question: Suppose that a national government increased deficit spending on goods and services, increasing its demand for loanable funds In the long run, this policy would most likely result in which of the following changes in this country?

choices.label: Real Interest Rate Investment Decrease Decrease
Real Interest Rate Investment Decrease Increase
Real Interest Rate Investment Increase Decrease
Real Interest Rate Investment Increase No change
Real Interest Rate Investment No change Increase

content.answer: Real Interest Rate Investment Increase Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
